title: Huawei cuts prices of a variety of high-end devices
author: Reuters
excerpt: Huawei cuts prices of a variety of high-end devices
text: BEIJING (Reuters) - Huawei cut the prices of a variety of high-end devices, including mobile phones, by up to 3,000 yuan ($411) over the weekend on one of China's leading e-commerce platforms, it said in a post on its official Weibo (NASDAQ:) social media account on Sunday. In a JD (NASDAQ:).com "Super Brand Day" promotion running from Saturday evening through to midnight on Sunday, Huawei offered discounts on its smartphones, headphones, watches and tablets, the post showed. ($1 = 7.2980 renminbi)
html:
BEIJING (Reuters) - Huawei cut the prices of a variety of high-end devices, including mobile phones, by up to 3,000 yuan ($411) over the weekend on one of China's leading e-commerce platforms, it said in a post on its official Weibo (NASDAQ:) social media account on Sunday.

In a JD (NASDAQ:).com "Super Brand Day" promotion running from Saturday evening through to midnight on Sunday, Huawei offered discounts on its smartphones, headphones, watches and tablets, the post showed.

($1 = 7.2980 renminbi)
